name: UVRScoutingInteractor
doc: Represents the interactor in the world

bReceivesEditorInput: If set to true, then this interactor will be able to recieve input delegate callbacks when in the editor. Defaults to true since we will always want this interactor to consume input

methods.name: GetGizmoMode
methods.doc: Gets the gizmo mode for selected object

methods.name: GetInputComponent
methods.doc: Returns the current InputComponent. This will be NULL unless bReceivesEditorInput is set to true.

methods.name: SetGizmoMode
methods.doc: Sets the gizmo mode for selected object
